author: V K Rajah JC:
casename: Midlink Development Pte Ltd v The Stansfield Group Pte Ltd
counsel: Ranjeet Singh and Amerjeet Singh (Francis Khoo and Lim) for plaintiffs; Lim Kim Hong (Kim and Co) for defendant; Gregory Vijayendran and Mohamed Gul (Wong Partnership) for defendants with effect from 24 May 2004
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Pleadings/Amendment/Application to amend pleadings made nine days after judgment entered/Whether application should be allowed
Civil Procedure/Pleadings/Whether necessary to expressly plead defence of non-compliance with s 6(d) Civil Law Act to rely on such defence at trial/Section 6(d) Civil Law Act (Cap 43, 1999 Rev Ed)
Contract/Formalities/Acceptance/Whether silence following offer tantamount to acceptance
Contract/Formation/Oral agreement between parties/Agreement not engrossed and executed/Whether subsequent conduct of parties consistent with conclusion of such tenancy agreement between them
